segments.text: Hello everyone ! I ’ m Rick Fields , and here with me is Bob Copeland .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Howdy folks , and welcome to today ’ s game ! You know , Rick , today is a key game between Russia and Canada . As you know , the winner will move on to the finals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right , and it looks like we ’ re just about ready to start the match . The ref is calling the players for the face-off ... and here we go ! The Russians win possession and immediately set up their attack ! Federal gets checked hard into the boards !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maurice Richard has the puck now , and passes it to the center . He shoots ! Wow what a save by the goalie !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , the puck is back in play now . Pavel Bure is on a breakaway ! He is flying down the ice ! The defenders can ’ t keep up ! Slap shot ! He scores .
segments.speaker: S1
